### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE CaseFiles (
  case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT,
  case_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LegalDocuments (
  doc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  doc_name VARCHAR(255),
  doc_type VARCHAR(50),
  doc_content TEXT,
  case_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CaseFiles(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CaseHistory (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID,
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  event_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CaseFiles(case_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE CaseFiles SET case_name = 'Updated Case Name' WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE cases (
 case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name STRING,
 case_description STRING,
 case_status STRING,
 case_created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
 document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 document_title STRING,
 document_type STRING,
 document_content TEXT,
 document_created_at TIMESTAMP,
 case_id UUID REFERENCES cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
 lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 lawyer_name STRING,
 lawyer_specialization STRING,
 lawyer_email STRING,
 lawyer_phone STRING
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
 client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 client_name STRING,
 client_email STRING,
 client_phone STRING
)

CREATE TABLE case_assignments (
 assignment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 lawyer_id UUID REFERENCES lawyers(lawyer_id),
 case_id UUID REFERENCES cases(case_id),
 assignment_date TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE cases SET case_status = 'Closed' WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
